name: astral-portfolio-theme
title: Astral Portfolio Theme
desc: Astral is a sleek, minimal portfolio theme built with Tailwind CSS and designed for creative professionals who value clean aesthetics and performance. With a framework-agnostic approach, Astral seamlessly adapts to your favorite stack, ensuring you can integrate it into any workflow. Subtle animations and a fully responsive design create a refined user experience that puts your work front and center.
